alert.note: Alert for Garland; Grant; Hot Spring; Pulaski; Saline (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 13 at 8:14AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Grant, east central Garland, eastern Saline, northeastern Hot Spring and central Pulaski Counties through 845 AM CDT... At 814 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Haskell, or 9 miles southwest of Benton, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Little Rock... Benton... West Little Rock... Bryant... Southwest Little Rock... Haskell... Shannon Hills... Traskwood... Tull... Lonsdale... Otter Creek... Mabelvale... Salem in Saline County... Chenal Valley... East End... Alexander... Bauxite... Avilla... Shaw... Glen Rose... This includes the following highways... Interstate 30 between mile markers 104 and 132. Interstate 430 between mile markers 1 and 4. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Garland; Grant; Hot Spring; Pulaski; Saline
